import React, { useRef } from "react"; import { NavLink, useLocation } from "react-router-dom" import { useState } from 'react' import HeaderNavList from "./HeaderNavList"; function Header() { //uselocation for give registration const location = useLocation() //const [genderLink, setGenderLink] = useState("") const [NavBotttom, setNavBottom] = useState("nav") const setNavLink = ({ isActive }) => { if (isActive) { setNavBottom("nav active") return "header__gender-link activeLink" } else { setNavBottom("nav") return "header__gender-link" } } //isActive ? "header__gender-link activeLink" setNavBottom() : "header__gender-link" const searchBtn = (bull) => bull ? "header__search-btn active" : "header__search-btn" const [search, setSearch] = useState('') if (search != '') { searchBtn(true) } return ( <>
